description: Install or upgrade a helm chart.

chart.description: The chart to install. This could be a reference to a chart in a helm repository, or a path to a chart archive or directory.

version.description: If +chart+ is a reference, this is the version to install. If not set, the latest version is installed.

release.description: The name of the installed instance of the chart.

values.description: YAML override values for chart settings.

kubeconfig.description: The path to the k8s config file needed to access the cluster we're installing into.
